name: fishbone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a bone from a fish: Be careful not to choke on a fishbone. Their plates were covered in fishbones. I felt like I had a fish bone stuck in my throat.
a shape or an object that looks like the skeleton of a fish: I love the little details in the pattern, like the fishbone. She bought some silver fishbone earrings. It was a fish bone diagram.
More examplesFewer examplesShe had choked on an obstruction, believed to be a fishbone.The darts were tipped with extremely sharp fishbones.The weathered rocks look similar to fishbones.The trees behind the hut were pines, their outlines stiff and spiky as fishbones against the sky.This medieval walled town was built in a fishbone shape with a succession of narrow streets that branch off the "spine".
